org.opends.server.workflowelement.localbackend

Class LocalBackendSearchOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.core.OperationWrapper<SearchOperation>
      • org.opends.server.core.SearchOperationWrapper
        • org.opends.server.workflowelement.localbackend.LocalBackendSearchOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, SearchOperation, Operation, InProgressOperation, PluginOperation, PostOperationOperation, PostOperationSearchOperation, PreOperationOperation, PreOperationSearchOperation, SearchEntrySearchOperation, SearchReferenceSearchOperation

    public class LocalBackendSearchOperation
extends SearchOperationWrapper
implements PreOperationSearchOperation, PostOperationSearchOperation, SearchEntrySearchOperation, SearchReferenceSearchOperation
    This class defines an operation used to search for entries in a local backend of the Directory Server.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Backend backend
      The backend in which the search is to be performed.
      protected DN baseDN
      The base DN for the search.
      protected ClientConnection clientConnection
      The client connection for the search operation.
      protected SearchFilter filter
      The filter for the search.
      protected PersistentSearch persistentSearch
      The persistent search request, if applicable.
      protected boolean processSearch
      Indicates whether we should actually process the search.

      • Fields inherited from interface org.opends.server.types.Operation

        LOCALBACKENDOPERATIONS

      Constructor and Description
      LocalBackendSearchOperation(SearchOperation search)
      Creates a new operation that may be used to search for entries in a local backend of the Directory Server.

    • Field Detail

      • backend

        protected Backend backend
        The backend in which the search is to be performed.

      • processSearch

        protected boolean processSearch
        Indicates whether we should actually process the search. This should only be false if it's a persistent search with changesOnly=true.

      • clientConnection

        protected ClientConnection clientConnection
        The client connection for the search operation.

      • baseDN

        protected DN baseDN
        The base DN for the search.

      • persistentSearch

        protected PersistentSearch persistentSearch
        The persistent search request, if applicable.

      • filter

        protected SearchFilter filter
        The filter for the search.

        public LocalBackendSearchOperation(SearchOperation search)
        Creates a new operation that may be used to search for entries in a local backend of the Directory Server.
        Parameters:
        search - The operation to process.

    • Method Detail

      • processLocalSearch

        public void processLocalSearch(LocalBackendWorkflowElement wfe)
                        throws CanceledOperationException
        Process this search operation against a local backend.
        Parameters:
        wfe - The local backend work-flow element.
        Throws:
        CanceledOperationException - if this operation should be cancelled

      • handleRequestControls

        protected void handleRequestControls()
                              throws DirectoryException
        Handles any controls contained in the request.
        Throws:
        DirectoryException - If there is a problem with any of the request controls.
